name: Message to the Wildhammer
tooltip:
Message to the WildhammerLevel 48

Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to slaughter 15 Highvale Outrunners, 15 Highvale Scouts, 15 Highvale Marksman and 15 Highvale Rangers. Return to him when this task is complete.

You can find the Highvale high elves at the Quel'Danil Lodge in the northwestern region of the Hinterlands.

Requirements:
- Highvale Scout x 15
- Highvale Outrunner x 15
- Highvale Ranger x 15
- Highvale Marksman x 15
